description: The DEC PDP-8 released in 1965, as a minicomputer
The Altair 8800 introduced in 1974, featured an Intel 8080 processor.
The Commodore Amiga 1000 released in 1985, featured a Motorola 68000 processor.
The Apple Power Macintosh 6100 from the 1990s, featured a PowerPC 601 processor.
The Sony VAIO PCV-RXG408 from the 2000s, featured an Intel Pentium 4 processor.
The Dell XPS 15 from the 2010s, featured an Intel Core i7 processor.
The Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch from the 2020s, features an Intel Core i9 processor.
